definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
to let go of the big prize while grabbing at trifles (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 le5 zhi1 ma5 diu1 le5 xi1 gua1

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大约只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 该公司在加利福尼亚和俄勒冈州出售西瓜汁。

sentences.english: Descriptions from that era describe ripe watermelons as having a yellowish interior.
sentences.chinese: 那个时代对成熟西瓜的描述是拥有淡黄色的内瓤。

sentences.english: A vendor rests next to watermelons at a fruit market in Hangzhou, east China's Zhejiang province May 16, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 浙江杭州一水果市场里，小贩在成堆的西瓜旁小憩。

sentences.english: A wartermelon is cut into four equal pieces.
sentences.chinese: 一个西瓜被切成四等份。

sentences.english: The invention discloses watermelon juice nutritious milk and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 一种西瓜汁营养奶及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Weiwei is bored with watermelon, so I intend to make some change.
sentences.chinese: 吃了几天的西瓜，我打算换些吃的喂它。

sentences.english: And then there are seedless fruits like navel oranges and seedless watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 而且有许多的无核水果，比如脐橙，无核西瓜。

sentences.english: I like eating watermelons in summer.
This game has watermelon bowling, two bonus games potatoes mine warfare.
sentences.chinese: 本游戏有西瓜保龄球，土豆地雷战两个奖励游戏。

sentences.english: Good. I'll have water-melon, and bring me some egg tarts, please.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我要西瓜，另外，再给我一些蛋挞。

sentences.english: Watermelon, the wonderful fruit in summer.
"He told me:"drink spot hot boiling water , so watermelon seeds were died.
sentences.chinese: 多喝一点热开水，把西瓜籽烫死就没事了。

sentences.english: Watermelons in Beijing in the summer are a dime a dozen.
sentences.chinese: 北京的夏天，西瓜多得根本不值钱了。

sentences.english: The seedlings of watermelon grow on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 西瓜的瓜秧是在地上的。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
